prompts.prompt: I need a Python code snippet to implement the BigBird model for NLP tasks. The goal is to use the BigBird model to predict the Net Promoter Score (NPS) from the 'content' column of a DataFrame named 'df_calls'. The DataFrame contains text data from customer calls. The code should include necessary imports, loading the BigBird model, and a simple example of how to apply the model to predict NPS from the text data in the DataFrame.
